title: Download Rocky
description: Download the official release of Rocky from one of our trusted mirrors.

get-involved.heading: Mach mit!
get-involved.body: As you download and use Rocky, the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation invites you to <0>be a part of the community as a contributor</0>. There are many ways to contribute to the project, from documentation, QA, and testing to coding changes for SIGs, providing mirroring or hosting, and helping other users.

isos.heading: Was ist der Unterschied zwischen den ISOs?
isos.body: Various installation images are available for installing Rocky. Which image you need to download depends on your installation environment and use-case.

boot.heading: Start
boot.body: Wird verwendet, um das Betriebssystem von einer anderen Quelle zu installieren (z.B. ein HTTP-Repository der Binärdateien). Kann auch verwendet werden, um in den Rettungsmodus zu gelangen.

minimal.heading: Minimal
minimal.body: Wird verwendet, um das Betriebssystem von einer anderen Quelle zu installieren (z.B. ein HTTP-Repository der Binärdateien). Kann auch verwendet werden, um in den Rettungsmodus zu gelangen.

dvd.heading: DVD
dvd.body: A full installation that contains the BaseOS and AppStream repositories and allows you to complete the installation without additional repositories. Installing Rocky from the DVD ISO is the easiest and most common method of performing a standard Rocky 8 installation.
